column2:
"Gettemhart and Melphonsina,
citizens of Verun,
decided to travel with the Guardian."

"Despite their party's numbers, not a
single word was uttered along the way."
"Umm, Gettemhart. Is there anything you want to talk about while we rest?"
"Hah, don't make me laugh. There's nothing to say."
"Hey, Gettemhart!"
"Please excuse him, I know he comes off as rude."
"No, it's fine. I don't think he means it... But even so, you two sure are close. What's your relationship with him?"
"Well, that's..."
"Sina and I were experimental demon soldiers."
"Experimental demon soldiers?"
"Just as Cuent used Ephimera to create Devil Castles, Verun had its own magic."
"It is known as Demonization. Magic that strengthens the body by infusing it with Mana."
"Naturally, this magic took a certain amount of skill to use. Only a few people could perform it."
"However, all that changed with the discovery of Ephimera."
"With Ephimera's help, just being able to use magic was enough. Skill was no longer an issue."
"Of course, most people cannot use magic at all..."
"Thus, by imperial decree, the Imperial Demon Soldier Project was formed."
"Our gracious Emperor would take the weak and the useless, and turn them into powerful soldiers, out of the goodness of his heart. Ha."
"That damned magical flower, Ephimera, took care of all that for him."
"So they forced those without magical affinity to become demons. Likely by experimenting on their bodies..."
"Oh, good guess, short stuff. You talking from experience or something?"
"But doing that would make their bodies burn out."
"Hahaha! That's right, short stuff. A guess like that, it's like you've seen it happen before!"
"But I bet you've never seen someone filled with Mana till they break, right? You don't know about all the things that can happen, do you?"
"Gettemhart and I were part of the Demon Soldier Project's first batch of test subjects. We managed to escape the facility."
"There were originally four thousand ninety-six of us, but now we are all that's left. We're sure that no-one else survived."
"Wait, if your strength comes from demonization, doesn't that mean you're risking your lives..."
"Ha, I couldn't care less about a damned life like this!"
"All I want is the Emperor. To crush him with my own hands."
"I'll make him pay for what he did to me, and Sina, and everyone else. He'll pay with his life."
"So, Guardian. Don't pull that goody two-shoes \"take care of yourself\" act on me, alright?"
"You want to beat the Emperor too, don't you? If you want to make yourself useful, go ahead. But if you get in my way, I'll crush you first."
"I must apologize for his attitude... But I feel the same way."
"I live to avenge those who were killed by the Emperor's whims. That's all that I have left."
"We fight for one reason. To kill the Emperor."
"1. Scared?"
"2. What's the matter?"
"Oh, sorry, I was lost in thought. While I did feel scared, there were other things I was curious about..."
"Oh, sorry, I was lost in thought. That was an interesting story..."
"These Demon Soldiers. It's similar to the story of how the Photoners created ARKS."
"Abducting a large number of tough-bodied creatures and genetically modifying them, infusing them with Photons to try and induce aptitude..."
"The records show that many lives were lost in trying to stabilize and mass-produce the process... It was a truly dark time in our history."
"To see it happen again, if only on Omega... We have to stop this..."
